mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT AS penaltyIssueddCnt /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.FEE_RATE AS feeRate /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE /* 직영/숙박 취소 규정 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE_PK(P),FK_EZC_DIST_ROOM_EZC_DIST_CANC(R),SYS_C0011393(C) */ AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT = #{penaltyIssueddCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE_PK(P),SYS_C0011394(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE /* 직영/숙박 취소 규정 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT = #{penaltyIssueddCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.FEE_RATE = #{feeRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT AS penaltyIssueddCnt /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.FEE_RATE AS feeRate /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE /* 직영/숙박 취소 규정 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT = #{penaltyIssueddCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.FEE_RATE = #{feeRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE.ROOM_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE SET /* 직영/숙박 취소 규정 */ FEE_RATE = #{feeRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT = #{penaltyIssueddCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DIST_CANCEL_RULE /* 직영/숙박 취소 규정 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PENALTY_ISSUEDD_CNT = #{penaltyIssueddCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 패널티 발생일 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
